description: The columns of this table contain the registry description information of a registry record.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RECORD_DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Stores a description of what this registry record does
